# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_TURRET_SPEED_THIS_FRAME

## Summary
Sets a tank or heli's turret speed

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **FLOAT** turretSpeed

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets a vehicle's turret speed on a per-frame basis
